QuestData.Title: Temel, the Sin Herald
QuestData.Description:
<Before flying away, Echelon shouted an additional command.>
Expropriate Temel as well. He will know how to exploit the sinstone properly.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Diligent caretaker of crypts and guardian of Temel, the Sin Herald.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Cryptkeeper Kassir to earn Temel's obedience.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Echelon outside the Halls of Atonement.
QuestData.RewardText:
<Echelon eyes Temel suspiciously.>
I never liked this runt.
